description.narrative: Major delays at all stages of the study. Phase I was approved in February 1997 and Phase II mobilization delayed by dispute over scope of human resource assessments. Closely monitored by the Bank and disbursement deadline extended until 30 June 1998.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation - urban sanitation
